name: Tap & Clapp
description:
Tap & Clapp is a physics puzzle game.

Game features:
- 80 levels
- map editor
- new game element every 5 levels
- really interesting and hard puzzles
- everything is made via physics
- cute graphics and sound
- no ads
- no in-app purchases

I bet, only 25% people will complete all levels and only 1% will collect all 3 stars on each level.
My game has casual graphics but the gameplay is very hardcore, so if you are looking for easy casual game find another one.
But if you want challenging puzzles you are welcome!
